alert.note: Alert for Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 04 at 11:23AM EDT until April 08 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Indiana... Ohio River at Shawneetown affecting Gallatin, Union, Hardin and Crittenden Counties. Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam affecting Union and Posey Counties. .The river will rise to a crest Thursday afternoon and then fall below flood stage this weekend. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. * WHEN...Until Saturday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 37.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 38.4 feet early Thursday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
